summary: The businessman who sends the first Chilean astronaut into outer space can't quite come up with the money to bring the adventurer back.
cast: Boris Quercia|Javiera Contador|Willy Semler|Hugo Arana|Álvaro Rudolphy|Bélgica Castro|Cristián Arriagada|Luis Corvalán|Catalina Saavedra|Antonio Quercia|Christian Michaelsen|Felipe Castro|César Arredondo|Sergio Hernández|Rodrigo Gijón|Luis Gnecco|José Luis Aguilera|Jack Arama|Andrés San Martín|Erick Melo|Francisco González|Jorge Guerrero|Ramón Llao|Kika Neumann|Javier Deneken|Cristián Quezada|Renzo Briceño|Freddy Huerta|Alfonso Sánchez|Esteban Cabezas|Alfonso David|Horacio Videla|Gianfranco Dazzareis|Tonka Tomicic|Valentina Álvarez|Eugenio Morales|Carolina Azócar|Gonzalo Gallo|Raúl Salas|Iván Olivares
title: Chile Puede
